Returns the arc cosine (or inverse cosine) of a number.

 Math.acos( number )
==Parameters==
The required number argument is a numeric expression.


==Return Value==
The arc cosine of the number argument, in radians.


==Example==
The following code shows how to use the '''acos''' function.

 var v1 = Math.acos(-1.0);
 var v2 = Math.cos(-1.0);
 
 document.write(v1);
 document.write("&lt;br/&gt;");
 document.write(v2);
 
 // Output:
 // 3.141592653589793
 // 0.5403023058681398

==Remarks==
'''Applies To''' : [[javascript/Math|Math Object]]
